name: prisjakt/restler
description:
Restler is a simple and effective multi-format Web API Server written in PHP.
Just deal with your business logic in php, restler will take care of the REST!

suggest.luracast/explorer: Restler's very own api explorer (see require-dev for details)
suggest.guzzle/guzzle: RESTful api HTTP client framework (see require-dev for details)
suggest.behat/behat: Behaviour driven development testing framework (see require-dev for details)
suggest.rodneyrehm/plist: Restler supports tho Apple plist xml format (see require-dev for details)
suggest.zendframework/zendamf: Support for the amf document format  (see require-dev for details)
suggest.symfony/yaml: Restler can produce content in yaml format as well (see require-dev for details)
